author: sussman
msg: Implement the ability to read data from a repos file:
Also, stop calling open_path in svn_fs_apply_textdelta:
(txdelta_baton_t):  lose parent_path, gain a dag_node_t instead.

author: cmpilato
msg: (get_dag): Wrapper function around open_path for those who care only
about the dag_node_t of the found node (the implication here being
that the node must have been found).
complements of Yoshiki.  Minor tweak to his patch, whereby we make a
call to our new open_path() wrapper function, get_dag().

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_fs__dag_get_node): Renamed from create_node, and exposed to
other FS module components outside of dag.c.

author: sussman
msg: Convenience routine to push an svn_string_t at txdelta window handler.

author: sussman
msg: Implement svn_fs_apply_textdelta().  We're almost ready to put data in
(struct txdelta_baton_t):         baton used by all machinery.
